original_text: As the proverb of the ancients says, ‘Out of the wicked comes wickedness.’ But my hand shall not be against you.
korean_text: 옛 속담에 말하기를 악은 악인에게서 난다 하였으니 내 손이 왕을 해하지 아니하리이다

sentences.original_text: As the proverb of the ancients says,
But my hand shall not be against you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내 손이 너를 치지는 않겠다.
